title: A Li Tonghua Gushi Ji Di 2 Ji
title_japanese: 阿狸童话故事集 第2季
synopsis: Ari discovered that there are many people in this world. Although they have experienced growth, they have lost their childlike innocence and become confused, numb and lonely. Ari helps them regain their confidence through experience and adventure. During this period, he helped the gluttonous hamster to find his own position and value, and helped the scavengers collect stars and send them back to the sky. Ari and Taozi Daxiong strayed into a mysterious chessboard and defeated the proud white queen of chess through wisdom and courage. Ari helps a grumpy gentleman who has lost his partner to find lost love and memories. In the small town theater, Ari learned that the ideal of marionette is to be a dancer. Ari encourages him to pursue himself bravely and not be afraid of failure. In the end, the marionette was blessed by fate.(translated from douban)
